data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Bundibugyo against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bundibugyo, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Bundibugyo, Uganda that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Bundibugyo, Uganda.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Bundibugyo, Uganda the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Nubian people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Bundibugyo, Uganda.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Bundibugyo, Uganda, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bundibugyo, Uganda. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Bundibugyo
location.people_groups_list: Mvuba, Karamojong, Plains Bira, Meneng, Aringa
